_sText:
This is 2nd playable version of map inspired by real location.
I took a part on Realistic mapping contest with uvalno_kostel map, which was big and unplayable. So I decided to remake this map to hostage rescue version.

Technical note: - Max/Min Fade distance causing disappearing some far-away props. IT IS NOT BUG, it is optimization method.

Each round hostage spawn randomly on set locations. This improve strategy in rescuing and defending. 

See also de_uvalno_funeral (1st playable map based on original map of real location)

If you like this one, check all of my maps here
This map or its parts is also used in my singleplayer mod

Have a fun
Dinus Saurus
